activities: Major, Lindsey & Africa, LLC and/or its U.S.-based operations (collectively, "MLA") receives personal information regarding natural persons located in the EEA and/or Switzerland from the Major, Lindsey & Africa, LLC operations in the EU in connection with activities such as:  (1) providing recruiting and staffing services for temporary and permanent placements; and (2) processing for purposes consented to by the subjects of the personal information.  MLA may also process personal information regarding current, former, potential and prospective employees (collectively “Personnel”) in connection with MLA’s activities as an employer or potential employer.  MLA processes such personal information in connection with its obligations as an employer and to provide services and benefits to the Personnel.  MLA does not sell personal information.  The personal information received may be stored in the U.S. in support of MLA's staffing and employment services and other business activities.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Offline, on-line, manually processed data, and human resources data
recoursemech: For human resources data:  EU data protection authorities.  For all other types of data:  BBB EU Safe Harbor Program.
